text: Marta Fascina (born 9 January 1990) is an Italian politician. She is a member of Forza Italia. She has been a member of the Chamber of Deputies since 2018. Fascina from March 2020 until his death in June 2023, dated with the former Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1990 births Category:Politicians from Calabria
title: Marta Fascina
